mapper.sql: a.id as id ,a.guzhangshangbao_id as guzhangshangbaoId ,a.xuesheng_id as xueshengId ,a.guzhangshangbao_commentback_text as guzhangshangbaoCommentbackText ,a.reply_text as replyText ,a.insert_time as insertTime ,a.update_time as updateTime ,a.create_time as createTime
mapper.select:
SELECT
-- 级联表的字段 ,guzhangshangbao.xuesheng_id as guzhangshangbaoXueshengId ,guzhangshangbao.guzhangshangbao_uuid_number as guzhangshangbaoUuidNumber ,guzhangshangbao.quyu_types as quyuTypes ,guzhangshangbao.guzhangshangbao_address as guzhangshangbaoAddress ,guzhangshangbao.guzhangshangbao_guzhang as guzhangshangbaoGuzhang ,guzhangshangbao.guzhangshangbao_types as guzhangshangbaoTypes ,guzhangshangbao.weixiuyuan_id as guzhangshangbaoWeixiuyuanId ,guzhangshangbao.chulijieguo_types as chulijieguoTypes ,xuesheng.xuesheng_name as xueshengName ,xuesheng.xuesheng_id_number as xueshengIdNumber ,xuesheng.xuesheng_phone as xueshengPhone ,xuesheng.xuesheng_photo as xueshengPhoto ,xuesheng.xuesheng_delete as xueshengDelete
FROM guzhangshangbao_commentback a left JOIN guzhangshangbao guzhangshangbao ON a.guzhangshangbao_id = guzhangshangbao.id left JOIN xuesheng xuesheng ON a.xuesheng_id = xuesheng.id
and a.id in
#{item}
and ( a.guzhangshangbao_id = #{params.guzhangshangbaoId} )
and ( a.xuesheng_id = #{params.xueshengId} or guzhangshangbao.xuesheng_id = #{params.xueshengId} )
and a.guzhangshangbao_commentback_text like CONCAT('%',#{params.guzhangshangbaoCommentbackText},'%')
and a.reply_text like CONCAT('%',#{params.replyText},'%')
and UNIX_TIMESTAMP(a.insert_time) >= UNIX_TIMESTAMP(#{params.insertTimeStart})
and UNIX_TIMESTAMP(a.insert_time) <= UNIX_TIMESTAMP(#{params.insertTimeEnd})
and UNIX_TIMESTAMP(a.update_time) >= UNIX_TIMESTAMP(#{params.updateTimeStart})
and UNIX_TIMESTAMP(a.update_time) <= UNIX_TIMESTAMP(#{params.updateTimeEnd})
and a.guzhangshangbao_id IS NOT NULL
and guzhangshangbao.guzhangshangbao_uuid_number like CONCAT('%',#{params.guzhangshangbaoUuidNumber},'%')
and guzhangshangbao.quyu_types = #{params.quyuTypes}
and guzhangshangbao.guzhangshangbao_address like CONCAT('%',#{params.guzhangshangbaoAddress},'%')
and guzhangshangbao.guzhangshangbao_guzhang like CONCAT('%',#{params.guzhangshangbaoGuzhang},'%')
and guzhangshangbao.guzhangshangbao_types = #{params.guzhangshangbaoTypes}
and guzhangshangbao.weixiuyuan_id = #{params.weixiuyuanId}
and guzhangshangbao.chulijieguo_types = #{params.chulijieguoTypes}
and a.xuesheng_id IS NOT NULL
and xuesheng.xuesheng_name like CONCAT('%',#{params.xueshengName},'%')
and xuesheng.xuesheng_id_number like CONCAT('%',#{params.xueshengIdNumber},'%')
and xuesheng.xuesheng_phone like CONCAT('%',#{params.xueshengPhone},'%')
and xuesheng.xuesheng_delete >= #{params.xueshengDeleteStart}
and xuesheng.xuesheng_delete <= #{params.xueshengDeleteEnd}
and xuesheng.xuesheng_delete = #{params.xueshengDelete}
order by a.${params.orderBy} desc
